required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 3 Study of BIBP Diphtheria, Tetanus and Acellular Pertussis (Three Components) Combined Vaccine, Adsorbed
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Blinded, Parallel Controlled Phase 3 Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of the Diphtheria, Tetanus and Three-components Acellular Pertussis Combined Vaccine, Adsorbed in Healthy Infants at the Age of 2 Months and 3 Months

lead_sponsor.agency: China National Biotec Group Company Limited

collaborator.agency: Beijing Institute of Biological Products Co Ltd.

clinical_study.source: China National Biotec Group Company Limited

brief_summary.textblock:
The study will evaluate the safety, immunogenicity，immune persistence and lot-to-lot consistency of Diphtheria,Tetanus and Acellular Pertussis (Three Components) Combined Vaccine, Adsorbed, (DTacP) including 2 parts:
PART 1 will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of DTacP in health infants aged 2 months and 3 months compared with an adsorption Tetanus-diphtheria-acellular Pertussis (DTaP) Vaccine and Diphtheria,tetanus,pertussis(acellular,component),poliomyelitis(inactivated) vaccine(absorbed) and Haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate vaccine (PENTAXIM)，compare the safety and immunogenicity of DTacP with different immunization schedules, and observe the immune persistence.
PART 2 will evaluate the lot-to-lot consistency of DTacP in health infants aged 3 months with the 3-dose schedule of 3-4-5 month.

primary_outcome.measure: The seroconversion rate of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
primary_outcome.description: seroconversion is defined as post-third dose antibody concentrations ≥ protective antibody concentration if pre-vaccination concentration is < protective antibody concentration, or ≥ 4 x protective antibody concentration if pre-vaccination concentrations ≥ protective antibody concentration.

primary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
primary_outcome.description: As measured at the central laboratory

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants reporting local reactions
primary_outcome.description: As elicited by investigational site staff

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants reporting systemic events
primary_outcome.description: As elicited by investigational site staff

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants reporting adverse events
primary_outcome.description: As elicited by investigational site staff

secondary_outcome.measure: The seropositivity rate of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
secondary_outcome.description: Seropositivity is defined as post-3 dose antibody concentrations ≥ protective antibody concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
secondary_outcome.description: As measured at the central laboratory

secondary_outcome.measure: The seropositivity rate of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
secondary_outcome.description: Seropositivity is defined as antibody concentrations ≥ protective antibody concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
secondary_outcome.description: As measured at the central laboratory

secondary_outcome.measure: The seropositivity rate of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
secondary_outcome.description: eropositivity is defined as antibody concentrations ≥ protective antibody concentration

other_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean Concentrations (GMCs) of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
other_outcome.time_frame: 12th month, 24th month, 36th month post-dose 4 , before 6 years old and day 30 post-dose 5
other_outcome.description: As measured at the central laboratory

other_outcome.measure: The seropositivity rate of anti-pertussis toxoid , anti-filamentous hemagglutinin, anti-Pertactin, anti-diphtheria toxoid and anti-tetanic antibody
other_outcome.time_frame: 12th month, 24th month, 36th month post-dose 4 , before 6 years old and day 30 post-dose 5
other_outcome.description: Seropositivity is defined as antibody concentrations ≥ protective antibody concentration

arm_group.description: subjects aged 3 months receive 3 doses of vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization, and a booster dose at 18 month old
subjects aged 3 months receive 3 doses of vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization, and a booster dose at 18 month old
subjects aged 3 months receive 3 doses of vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization, and a booster dose at 18 month old
subjects aged 2 months receive 3 doses of vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization, and a booster dose at 18 month old
subjects aged 2 months receive 3 doses of vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization, and a booster dose at 18 month old
subjects aged 2 months receive 3 doses of vaccines with a interval of 2 months for primary immunization, and a booster dose at 18 month old
subjects aged 3 months receive 3 doses of lot-1 vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization
subjects aged 3 months receive 3 doses of lot-2 vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization
subjects aged 3 months receive 3 doses of lot-3 vaccines with a interval of 30 days for primary immunization
